resources.string: DrivingTest.ca is an online driving test practice site that serves all provinces and territories in Canada. Advance through the practice tests at your own pace on any computer, tablet or mobile phone with internet access. While these tests are not the same as the actual ones you will be taking, they can give you a good idea of what to expect. It is all FREE!
I have read and accept the terms and conditions

string-array.name: m1Q1
string-array.item: Please select the answer that best describes the picture 1.
A construction sign replacing flagman on duty

string-array.name: m1Q2
string-array.item: Please select the answer that best describes the picture 2.
You are approaching a hospital zone

string-array.name: m1Q3
string-array.item: Please select the answer that best describes the picture 3.
Do not turn left at the intersection
You are approaching a traffic island
Do not turn right at the intersection

string-array.name: m1Q4
string-array.item: Please select the answer that best describes the picture 4.
The road ahead is split into two separate roads by a median

string-array.name: m1Q5
string-array.item: Please select the answer that best describes the picture 1.
Keep to the right of the traffic island
Pass other traffic on the right
